summary.span: 表示一个椭圆形的触笔笔尖。

span.span: Represents a stylus tip shaped like an ellipse.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建并将其传递给方法以擦除的一部分。The following example demonstrates how to create an and pass it to the method to erase a portion of a . 此示例假设有一个被调用`eraseTester`的, 并且其事件已连接到此示例中定义的事件处理程序。This example assumes that there is a called `eraseTester` and that its event has been connected to the event handler defined in this example. 若要创建使用户能够擦除墨迹的控件, 请参阅[如何:清除自定义控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md)上的墨迹。To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
